Annotations.Annotation: Cube Schema for CCRS - Joint Funding and Financing Profile

ExpressionView.SQL: select cp7.ID, cp7.DESIGNATION, cp7.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, cp7.OTHERUNCTJOINTLY_MANAGE_RESOURCES, CASE WHEN cp7.GOV_HAS_INTEGRATED_NATIONAL_FINANCING_FRAMEWORK = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp7.GOV_HAS_INTEGRATED_NATIONAL_FINANCING_FRAMEWORK = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as GOV_HAS_INTEGRATED_NATIONAL_FINANCING_FRAMEWORK, CASE WHEN cp7.HAS_REVIEW_OF_FINANCING_LANDSCAPE = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp7.HAS_REVIEW_OF_FINANCING_LANDSCAPE = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as HAS_REVIEW_OF_FINANCING_LANDSCAPE, CASE WHEN cp7.GOV_HASSDGFINANCING_GAP_STRATEGY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp7.GOV_HASSDGFINANCING_GAP_STRATEGY = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as GOV_HASSDGFINANCING_GAP_STRATEGY, CASE WHEN cp7.UNCT_HASSDGFINANCING_GAP_STRATEGY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp7.UNCT_HASSDGFINANCING_GAP_STRATEGY = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as UNCT_HASSDGFINANCING_GAP_STRATEGY, CASE WHEN cp7.UNCT_JOINTLY_MANAGE_RESOURCE_MOBILIZATION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp7.UNCT_JOINTLY_MANAGE_RESOURCE_MOBILIZATION = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as UNCT_JOINTLY_MANAGE_RESOURCE_MOBILIZATION, CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY from CP7JOINT_FUNDING_PROFILE cp7, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE cp1, BASE_COUNTRY bc, v_cp_validated_designations v WHERE cp7.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp7.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR AND cp7.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND cp7.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND cp7.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 and cp7.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = cp7.ENTITY_YEAR

Dimension.name: Partner government have an integrated national financing framework
Dimension.caption: Does your partner government have an integrated national financing framework?

Dimension.name: Review of the full financing landscape
Dimension.caption: Does it include a review of the full financing landscape?

Dimension.name: Partner government developed a strategy to close financing gap
Dimension.caption: Has your partner government developed a strategy to close the SDG financing gap?

Dimension.name: UNCT strategy to close financing gap
Dimension.caption: Has the UNCT developed a strategy to contribute to closing the SDG financing gap?

Dimension.name: Does the UNCT jointly manage resource mobilization
Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT jointly manage resource mobilization?

Measure.name: partnerGovernmentHaveIntegratedNationalFinancingFramework
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does your partner government have an integrated national financing framework?'

Measure.name: includeReviewOfFinancingLandscape?
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does it include a review of the full financing landscape?'

Measure.name: strategyToCloseSdgFinancingGap
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has your partner government developed a strategy to close the SDG financing gap?'

Measure.name: hasUnctStrategyToCloseFinancingGap
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT developed a strategy to contribute to closing the SDG financing gap?'

Measure.name: doesUnctManageResourceMobilization
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the UNCT jointly manage resource mobilization?'
